thread.title: 6 Of The Most Bizarre Things People Have Used In Their Make-Up Routines
thread.title_full: 6 Of The Most Bizarre Things People Have Used In Their Make-Up Routines

title: 6 Of The Most Bizarre Things People Have Used In Their Make-Up Routines
text:
facebook 101 SHARES 
Each day, the Internet shows or teaches us something we might not have already known. But as amazing as it is, there are some things online that we just can't wrap our heads around. For every brilliant, positive thing, there are about a billion legitimately insane, creepy, and disgusting things we wish we could un-see. And some of the most bizarre things we've seen people indulge in has to do with make-up. While one can find a bunch of mind-blasting videos of people making us all feel dismal about our make-up skills, there are some people who are just on the other end of the spectrum. Using things like stilettos, eggs and balloons, various MUAs have used some crazy things to help do their make-up. Yes, we know they're just humorous challenges they're doing for fun, but it doesn't make it any less icky (and in some cases, even scary). Here are some of the most bizarre make-up "tools" that have made their place on the Internet. Hard-boiled eggs to blend 
We would be in a permanent state of throwing up if went a whole day smelling like a boiled egg. Also, we don't think that's very hygienic. A post shared by NADI (@officialnadi) on Mar 7, 2017 at 2:51pm PST Mar 19, 2017 at 6:30am PDT Stilettos to contour
